reviewText: As a country music musician myself I can vouch for the efforts of the grand ole opry folks in trying to keep the old styles and class filled artists alive on dvd keep em coming folks
Title: Ralph Emery's Country Legends, Vol. 1

reviewText: I expected more from this DVD,  I was not impressed with alot of the singers or their song selection.  There a few great songs but far and few between.  Suggest saving your money and look for other country-western DVD's. Very disappointing.
Title: Ralph Emery's Country Legends, Vol. 1

reviewText: If you like country music then you must have this DVD! There are tons of country stars on this video, names like Gene Watson, Bobby Bear, Mel Tillis and many more. As always the very informative Ralph Emery gets the best stories from them too! You'll love it!
Title: Ralph Emery's Country Legends, Vol. 1

reviewText: These 2 DVDs are so wonderful. To see so many of the greats all seated together and singing one by one, and sometimes together, is a country music fan's Hillbilly Heaven dream. I especially enjoyed Barbara Fairchild. I loved her "Teddy Bear Song" when she was young. She has matured so beautifully. Her rendition of "You've Got Me Under Your Spell Again" just brings goosebumps. Also loved Willie and Kris Kristoferson. But the entire bunch is fantastic. I highly recommend this!
Title: Ralph Emery's Country Legends, Vol. 1

reviewText: If you  love country music this is one of the best DVD's I have ever purchased.One and half hours of country artist singing some of their greatest hits.
summary: ralph Emery when he was younger

reviewText: A definite must have to any countrym usic lovers collection. Great stores and sonsgs from great country music stars.They don't make them like this any more

reviewText: It was another night of great entertainment This was a no.1 tv show and a  very highly rated one back then .wish they were doing this again in this generationI AM SO HAPPY THAT THEY MADE DVD'S AND CDS OF ALL THESE UNFORGETTABLE LEGENDS

Title: Ralph Emery's Country Legends, Vol. 1

reviewText: I grew up on these great songs and watching these artists perform them.  Many of them still have amazing voices to sing and you get to hear an informal "jam session" with them singing their classics.  This is priceless!
summary: Ahhh! The Good Old Days Of Country Music!
Title: Ralph Emery's Country Legends, Vol. 1

reviewText: Enjoyed watching it.  Everyone is so young.  A keeper.  Well done.  I hate this having to have so many words.
Title: Ralph Emery's Country Legends, Vol. 1

reviewText: Not much to say.  I always love Ralph in everything he does.  Got here quickly and in good condition.  Have purchased other things he put out and plan on doing so in the future
Title: Ralph Emery's Country Legends, Vol. 1

reviewText: Ralph Emery's one of the greatest to get performers to revel personal stories and that is what helps us to love them. They are true, serious and dedicated to their talents and their talents are wonderful. As a true County Music fan I just love being a part of his shows.
Title: Ralph Emery's Country Legends, Vol. 1

reviewText: Ralph Emery's Legends Vol #1 & #2 are the best DVDs  ofCountry music ever. I have enjoyed watching them and listeningto all the stories they tell.The music is fantastic andthe stories are better than that. I can't say enough good thing about theseDVDs. Absolutely wonderful!
Title: Ralph Emery's Country Legends, Vol. 1

reviewText: After searching throughout the entire world I finally found Ralph Emery's Country Legends DVD Vol 1 & 2 at Amazon. I had seen some excerpts onYou Tube and it was so promising that I decided to get them. The 2DVDs are exceptionally good The sound and image are brilliant, theartists all legends: Kris Kristoffesron, Willie Nelson, Glen Campbell,B.J.Thomas, Bobby Bare, Porter Wagoner, Mickey Gilley, Gene Watson,B.J.Shaver, Lorrie Morgan, Janie Fricke, the incredible Barbara Fair-child, Mel Tillis. It's a fantastic jam session and the interpretations sound sometimes even better than the originals on record. The artiststell us the whereabouts of each song and the whole show is out of thisworld. A special mention of the band behind the singers. An abolutemust for the real country fans especially for all of us who lovedcountry music from the 60's, 70's and 80's. This incredible countrygathering is divided into 2 DVDs so you need both. Each one lastsapproximately 90 minutes so the complete gathering is a little over3 hours.
Title: Ralph Emery's Country Legends, Vol. 1
